page.title: 14CHILDRENS' HOBBIES
page.content: Children in Longford school have many different hobbies like Judo which Richard does at Derby Sports Centre. Lots of people collect badges in our school, the one with the most is Simon with 300. He collects them on a peg board. Rebecca collects book marks from places where she goes. Carol and Rachel collect china thimbles, Karen collects stamps and she keeps them in a album. Timothy collects coins he keeps them in a book. Nicholas keeps pigeons in a loft, he has got 28. Hannah, like a lot of other people, goes horse riding. I play cricket in the girls section of the womens team at Leicester cricket club.
